Uses of Interface
ch.powerunit.rules.SystemStreamRule

  • Packages that use SystemStreamRule 
    Package Description
    ch.powerunit
    Main functionnalities of powerunit.
    ch.powerunit.rules
    Default implementation or abstract for rule.

    • Uses of SystemStreamRule in ch.powerunit

      Methods in ch.powerunit that return SystemStreamRule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default SystemStreamRule TestSuite.disableBothStreams()
      Provide a test rule that suppress both system err and system out.
      default SystemStreamRule TestSuite.disableErrStream()
      Provide a test rule that suppress the system err stream.
      default SystemStreamRule TestSuite.disableOutStream()
      Provide a test rule that suppress the system out stream.
      default SystemStreamRule TestSuite.replaceBothStream(PrintStream outReplacement, PrintStream errRemplacement)
      Provide a test rule that replace both system err and system out with the provided one.
      default SystemStreamRule TestSuite.replaceErrStream(PrintStream errReplacement)
      Privde a test rule that replace the system err stream with the provided one
      default SystemStreamRule TestSuite.replaceOutStream(PrintStream outReplacement)
      Privde a test rule that replace the system out stream with the provided one
